name: Amber the witch
description:
Amber recently graduated from the University of Witchcraft and today marks the opening day to her brand new potion shop! Can you help her to complete the orders for her customers?

But you better be careful, as mixing wrong ingredients can have unexpected outcomes.  

Platform:

This game is made for the Oculus Quest I and II. So strap on and start your potion making adventure today!

Controls:

Made With:
